short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bringing inbox efficiency to the old.reddit inbox experience. Fork of Reddit Inbox Revamp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A better asynchronous message box for Reddit, featuring:

- Gmail-style list of messages with a preview of the message content
- Threaded conversation view
- Search by subject, sender, or message content
- Save messages to return to them later
- Frequent contacts

How to access the upgraded inbox:

1. Navigate to https://old.reddit.com/message/rir_inbox

OR

2. Click the new text bubble icon in the top-right corner of any old.reddit.com page. It will appear directly to the left of Reddit's default messaging icon (the one that turns orange)
